Subject: RE: Lost shipment, need claim letter & invoices

 

Hello Mohamed & Zainab,

 

I have investigated more and checked the contract of Naqel about the terms and conditions for damage or lost orders and the maximum auto liability is only SR 400 for any order unless it is insured with them as pert the signed agreement.

 

Internally I have checked as well with our Insurance department and they confirmed there is no active insurance policy for Chanel against E-com orders with REAL KSA, to activate the policy of insurance there is an amount average of USD 2K needs to be paid yearly.

 

Please check internally and update us.

 

Appreciate your understanding.

 

Regards,

 

 

AMR GAMALEDIN​​​​

CHALHOUB GROUP ARABIA LIMITED COMPANY LLC

Subject: RE: Lost shipment, need claim letter & invoices

 

Hello Mohamed & Zainab,

 

I have investigated more and checked the contract of Naqel about the terms and conditions for damage or lost orders and the maximum auto liability is only SR 400 for any order unless it is insured with them as pert the signed agreement.

 

Internally I have checked as well with our Insurance department and they confirmed there is no active insurance policy for Chanel against E-com orders with REAL KSA, to activate the policy of insurance there is an amount average of USD 2K needs to be paid yearly.

 

Please check internally and update us.

 

Appreciate your understanding.

 

Regards,

 

 

AMR GAMALEDIN​​​​
